website_summaries.verdict: Emerson's 1F78-151 programmable thermostat is fine, but its competitors offer more in terms of features and design.
pros: The Emerson 1F78-151 thermostat reliably automates your weekday and weekend temperature presets
cons: It feels cheap, has a particularly bland design and doesn't come with a backlight for making manual adjustments in low-light conditions

customer_reviews.title: Great, saved me money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a very old, very 70s thermostat in my rental apartment. It was so old that it had an actual mercury thermometer in it, and was wildly inaccurate. Since buying and installing this digita replacement, I have saved 25% on my power bill. It has already paid for itself, and I wish I would have bought it sooner. The install was fairly simple. you'll need to take a photo of the old wiring setup of the thermostat you are replacing, and have wire cutters and pliers to bend and shape wire on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sassie G. of Auburn, AL

customer_reviews.title: The unit was easy enough to install however...
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy enough to install however, programming it is another thing! I've installed dozens of programable thermostats and digital light timers. It took several attempts and drawing a logic diagram to figure it out. You are forced to program 4 different time/temperature periods for M - F and SA-SU. This was the worst and there is no phone support number on the box or the installation instructions. Not good when you're in an area with limited cell service for voice and no data!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Simple easy to use thermostat. With a slight modification was able to utilize this for a hydronic setup. Can be used for gas and electric heat as well. Batteries have lasted years and no issues with the other 3 we have in our home that were installed over 7 years ago
customer_reviews.author: hans

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I put one of these in our home and loved it, so when we moved into a new place, I immediately replaced the antique dial thermostat with this unit. It allows multiple settings and a separate setting for the weekends. I have the furnace come on just before we wake up, then lower the heat when we leave for work. It automatically raises the heat just before we return from work and lowers it again at bedtime. This is a good unit for the price, dependable and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: K Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Replacing same model
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the same model due to the temperature control buttons wearing out. Had the same issue with a LuxPro unit so I guess it's a common issue after 10-15 years. It's a decent unit, 4 temp changes per day with a separate weekday & weekend plan. No complaints in general. For what it's worth, I kept the box in my car when it was about 17 degrees outside. Once I connected the wires, it showed 42 degrees. Took over two hours for the thermostat to show the current temperature of 72 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: LIPhotoMan

customer_reviews.title: There are better options out htere but i bought this because it ...
customer_reviews.text: bought as a replacement for an old thermostat. Right off the bat i can say the temperature sensor is about 2-3 degree off. im using an electornic room thermometer to cross check the thermostat and they dont agree by 2-3 degreees. One of them is wrong and I believe it to be the thermostat. There are better options out htere but i bought this because it matched the old thermostat perfectly and we had just apintned the walls and I wanted an exact match thermosatt so I didnt have to repain around the replacement
customer_reviews.author: I.J.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I needed an Emerson thermostat to replace a 15 year old failed one. After much research and phone calling I purchased this one. It is an almost duplicate of the one that needed replacing, only the way you attached the wall wiring was much improved over the original version. It took about 20 minutes to install, and is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J-Lee

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (if you're replacing one like it, which is what I did). Probably won't use the programming stuff, but it cost less than the one without it, so this is what I got. Got about six years out of the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martini

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to do after watching about 5- 6 YouTube videos
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old thermostat with this one. It was easy to do after watching about 5- 6 YouTube videos. It was easy to program. The instructions were included but we're ok. Worked out great for us. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rashida Furniturewalla

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The builder thermostat that was in our house had some LCD issues. I picked this up after some research to find the closest match to my old unit. It went right in and works great.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mcclellan

customer_reviews.title: Unit works now as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first unit because 2 LCD segments in a single digit failed to display. Second unit was shipped immediately and it worked fine! So far no complaints. Unit was purchased to replace original unit installed 5 years ago that eventually had a similar display problem. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: audacious

customer_reviews.title: Standard thermostat functions in a neat package
customer_reviews.text: Standard thermostat for household use. Manages heat and A/C using several possible wire configurations. Programmable temperatures for time of day and day of week, separate programs for heat and A/C. Requires two alkaline batteries. Very reliable and easy to program. Must enter correct day and time to get proper operation.
customer_reviews.author: David Mausner

customer_reviews.title: cheap, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different versions and manufacturers over the years. Most are not easy to program and fail after a few years. At this point, it is easy to work with and if it fails I will be the exact model. I bought two.... also check your eectric cmpany for refunds.
customer_reviews.author: pj45

customer_reviews.title: Great programmable thermostat I had to replace one like it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great programmable thermostat I had to replace one like it that was 10 years old. Obviously there were some changes in the wire attachment as the screws are much smaller but not hard to hook up. You can't beat the price at Amazon and it is a breeze to install. White Rogers makes good products and honestly the batteries last me greater than 5 years on the one I replaced. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: BuddyH

customer_reviews.title: Dimension size is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions for this thermostat are incorrect - it is 5" wide and 3.5" high. We purchased this product because the dimensions are advertised as 6" wide. This size does not cover the cutout in the wallpaper surrounding the thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Baley

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to remove the wires from the old broken thermostat. This one was very easy to install and if it ever breaks, it should be removable with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, not a Honeywell
customer_reviews.text: Works great and super easy to install. Used it to replace a Honeywell that stopped working after 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: easy to install--took maybe 10 minutes. Worked right away. Replaced another new one I installed (company starting with Ho__ ,well known) that did work right at all. So, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Still works great.
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat works very good.It is also efficient on the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Levison

customer_reviews.title: This is a great inexpensive thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive thermostat. Seems to be more accurate as far as cycling the air conditioning unit. I will no more this winter as to how well is Cycles on heat. I'm thinking it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.H.

customer_reviews.title: that would be more better. I thought this one had that feature
customer_reviews.text: had for awhile now. no issues. if you can find the backlit version, that would be more better. I thought this one had that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A suitable product for its function
customer_reviews.text: The item replaces an identical unit that failed after 7 years of use. The failure of the prior unit was in the internal thermometer (likely a thermistor). The new unit has a 5 year warranty. Since the thermostat derives power from two AAA batteries, these were replaced about every two to three years. One difference noted is that the user's manual for the new unit omits mention of several functions of the prior unit, e.g., internal lighting or factory default reset of settings; otherwise the unit is quite functional and serves it purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: A good replacement thermostat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this thermostat to replace the original, which was identical, and suddenly was reading ambient temperature about 10 degrees off. This replacement was easy to install, as we had the old one to go from, and it was a good thing as the wiring instructions were hard to follow. But the thermostat works great!
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: keeping the temperature comfortable at all times without wasting power by over cooling ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old mercury switch thermostat with this one and it works flawlessly, keeping the temperature comfortable at all times without wasting power by over cooling or over heating. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Supai

customer_reviews.title: Great Simole Option
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and program, temperture reading seems to be accurate. If you're looking for a basic, user-friendly thermostat this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mama_bear_ali

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and easy to install, if you use it for cooling only cut the jumper and install red wire in the cooling slot.
customer_reviews.author: nodakwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Backlight instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions don’t tell you in order to activate the backlight you have to push both the time and run buttons and the use temp buttons to turn on and off!
customer_reviews.author: William F. Rist

customer_reviews.title: Good thermostat for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for half the cost of most Honeywell thermostats. Super easy to install. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the features at a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Fully functional programmable thermostat at a fraction of the cost of comparable thermostats. Follow the simple instructions to install for most any HVAC system.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Risk

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the exact same thermostat, which was originally put in with new central air years ago. I never bothered with programming. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Low quality- short reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Thermostat in January 2020. The Liquid Crystal Display failed in May 2020. This thermostat is low quality according to HVAC professionals. I will never buy this particular Thermostat again. This is the second one to fail in less than five years.
customer_reviews.author: elite777

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should well.
customer_reviews.text: We habe had it installed for over a year now and its been excellent. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WiBeachBum

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, same setup as my previous thermostat. Wires were a little tough to install due to tiny terminal screws in thermostat, not impossible to do just need some patience.
customer_reviews.author: Mc Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Works great costs 1/2 to 1/3 rd of retail locally.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the thermostat today and the furnace runs and comes up to heat. It was pretty easy to install and saved about $200 on a service call. I did turn off the furnace circuit breaker at the main.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried when purchasing, but this replaced my single temp non programmable TS. Very happy with the purchase would highly reccommend it to anyone needing a programmable unit
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - works well and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a harder-to-use version and it has made life simpler. Easy to set and reliable. Also easy to make a short term change to 'a little warmer' or cooler without fuss. Nice product, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: works well, easy to hook up with a 2 wire. nice that it has the backlight for dark rooms/night
customer_reviews.author: javan

customer_reviews.title: it was very hard to install since all the contacts ...
customer_reviews.text: it was very hard to install since all the contacts and screws are far smaller than the original. also the back light screen is not working, there is nothing explaining how to reset the back light in the manual and i cant find customer service number for white-rogers. basically spent the money to be right back where i started, thermostat with some non working functions
customer_reviews.author: Mo Be

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was easy to install. Replaced it with an older version.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: This is a good thermostat for the price you can
customer_reviews.text: This is a good thermostat for the price you can. Schedule 4 different times for the week and weekend easy to install and program instructions aren't great but it's pretty straight forward. You get a 15 minute option only 6:00 6:15 etc which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great fort the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great.. For the price they are perfect. Handles both ac and heat
customer_reviews.author: HomeGoodsBuyer

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, but the new interior design makes it hard to install than before.
customer_reviews.text: Our old ones did not work any more. Because we do not know much about these kind of controller, so we got this one which is the same model as our old ones. It is ok, but the new interior design makes it hard to install than before. I do not understand why the screws are so tight that I cannot even loose it to put connecting wire in!
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Works great and was a great price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our non-programmable version. Works great and was a great price, too! I'm hoping it will save us some money on AC this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, digital, accurate
customer_reviews.text: Had an older version of this that lasted a long time. Can be used without complex programing. Keeps temperature very close to set point. Easily readable with backlight. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Emerson programmable thermstat 1f78-151
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Only complaint is somewhat hard to program. Had these at previous house and didnt want to clutter up my brain learning how to do a new one.
customer_reviews.author: meant

customer_reviews.title: The unit itself seems to be very good works well
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself seems to be very good works well. I had a little bit of trouble with the installation instructions. With just a little clarification it went well. Now I am wondering how the light should work. I can turn the light on but when I press the next key it goes off. If it is intended to be a night light it is ok. On the White Rodgers thermostat it replaced the light stay on so you could make temperature adjustments etc. I will call in when I get around to it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Room temp shows 10 degrees above actual temp
customer_reviews.text: Defective! I replaced my old tstat with the exact model. Room temp shows 10 degrees above what it should be. Tried to do a hard reset but did nothing. Going to try to get a non programmable unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two. Both were repackaged rather sloppily with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. Both were repackaged rather sloppily with the essential insrallation hardware, manuals, warranty documentation missing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Good easy install
customer_reviews.text: Works as described... very easy install, love the programmable modes.
customer_reviews.author: MinnieWinnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: A nice easy to use thermostat. The reasons I didn't give it five stars are that there is no light to tell you if it is on and it only came in white. It replaced a 25 year old thermostat that had a glowing light to tell you if the heat was on. It was recommended by the electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue The Cats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Replaced the old one. Perfect fit. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Programmable thermostat does the job
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing my new White-Rodgers programmable thermostat. It does everything it was advertised to do. Easy to program, easy to install, and easy to read. Some thermostats show when it is calling for heat or the AC. This one does not. The display alternates between the time and the room temperature. This can be annoying as some have a bigger display showing both simultaneously. All in all, for the price, you cannot go wrong. Let's hope it gives me many years of maintenance free service.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install. Better brands out there.
customer_reviews.text: I had one originally installed by contractor. Lasted only 4 years. Went to replace with same model. Connection ports updated and now face downward making it difficult to access to place the wires. I finally gave up and bought a Honeywell model. Much easier to install. Don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Simple programmable thermostat
customer_reviews.text: It works and was fairly easy to install use but there is no backlight on the display as advertised on line and on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Used these to replace two old yellowed 40 year old thermostats. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: NTXGaming

customer_reviews.title: Defective when installed.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was just missing something, so had to call the manufacturers customer service. It turned out it was defective and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great price
customer_reviews.text: Put three of these in my house, Easy to install and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Downing

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to instal
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product again. The terminals are not very user friendly. I would go with a Honeywell instead because the terminals are much more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight M

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was easy to install. Easy to use. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat work s well and easy to install .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: replaced old unit that clock stopped working. that unit ...
customer_reviews.text: replaced old unit that clock stopped working. that unit not made anymore. new type of wire connector. just look very close and match old wire connect with the same letter. I only use mine for a/c.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and very easy to install. I've had it for months and it's working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: k.d.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, works like a charm, perfect replacement for our super old school thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quick delivery, simple install homeowner install. Easier to program than most
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: This replacing a 13 year old thermostat and is perfect for a hydronic in floor heating system
customer_reviews.text: This replacing a 13 year old thermostat and is perfect for a hydronic in floor heating system. Program it and change the batteries once a year and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Zon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just works. Drop in replacement for Emerson/White-Rodgers non-programmable. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: White Rodgers Programable Thermostat 1F78-151
customer_reviews.text: It was everything that was said about this thermostat. it was in good condition, just like new, works, good. I got it on time, at a good price. I am looking forward to doing business with you again, Gary.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Easy install and if you want to program it, it is simple.
customer_reviews.author: KathyL

customer_reviews.title: would have liked a bigger display - thought this was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: would have liked a bigger display - thought this was going to be bigger than it turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: marianne mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: simple and easy to use. my 83 year old mom loves it,as it is easy for her to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with used screws. There was drywall on the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for the price. It's very basic and very easy to program.Everything I needed
customer_reviews.author: Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and easy installation. Instructions were clear and unit looks good.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plugged my stove wires in and perfect function for my millivolt system. nice to have the programability
customer_reviews.author: Marc Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive, easily installed
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this simple little programmable controller works great. Installed myself easily. Have only had it for about a month and am hopeful it will last.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A true value. Have a professional wire it for you unless you really know what you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Robecology

customer_reviews.title: ... hook this up in the winter and it worked great until we tried to turn on the AC
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend hook this up in the winter and it worked great until we tried to turn on the AC. Ended up calling a professional to figure out what the problem was with the way we had it hooked up. Should've had them do it in the first place- not the thermostat's issue! There are fancier ones that allow for more preset options, this one has 6am, 8am, 5pm, and 10pm setting options M-F and S-S. Works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: D. RHODES

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: Used it for control of a propane "wood" stove so it wouldn't stay on all night if I forgot to turn the switch off. For this, it works off 2 (included) batteries. Easy to program and a bit complicated to install. Instructions clear. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use.  Replaced an earlier version in my house.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced two earlier versions of this thermostat in my house. The new one is smaller, so I had to do a little painting, but no big deal. Also, it was a little difficult to feed the wires in and get them cinched down due to the tight space. But otherwise I love it. It is EXTREMELY easy to use (makes my wife happy!) and a good price. Recommended. Gary
customer_reviews.author: Gary Samad

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: I installed this thermostat a week ago and it has performed exactly as advertised. I particularly like the feature that anticipates the future temperatures programmed into the system and, knowing the time required to reach certain temperature levels, acts in advance to be at the prescribed temperatures at the prescribed times. I do agree with another reviewer that the space allowed for terminating the wires is skimpy - but entirely adequate.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Conner

customer_reviews.title: it worked perfect for my application here at home I have an ...
customer_reviews.text: it worked perfect for my application here at home I have an rather Older furnace system an it fit in fine with awesome display.
customer_reviews.author: Kurotoma

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace an older unit where the set buttons were getting unresponsive. Price was a fraction of the box store and installation was easy. Be careful to make note of where the wires attach to the existing unit as the contacts may be different in this one.. mine was. Also comes defaulted to no back-light but reading the directions (not a strong guy activity) solved that. Delivery was very quick. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Like other said, it has a small hole to put the cable but doable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and smaller than older model
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to make connections on the terminal board but this was mentioned by other reviewers. Easy to use and smaller than older model.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G.Carter

customer_reviews.title: Crude ... not easy
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this unit would be simple so that it was easy to install and easy to program: not so. It's crude and difficult. The wiring requires a magnifier and tweezers or dental tools: it's practically inaccessible. It took me an hour to finally coax the little wires into position. Other thermostats are much more accessible. The programming is completely obscure. So, it has limited capability, but it's still difficult to program. I'll see if there's a Youtube video that shows how to do it since I can't make it work from the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wolgast

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use. Very good price
customer_reviews.text: The thermostats, once installed are simple and easy to program. That said, I hesitated to deal with the 8-wire system that is in our home and had them installed by a professional who could test the heating system for correct functioning. They are actually sold by an Amazon associate which made me wonder, but the vendor, Air & Water, proved to be quick and have very reasonable shipping charges. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: white rogers prog themo 1f78-151
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to attach all wires. Easier if you leave box hanging, rather than attaching to wall first. Easy to program. Product works great.
customer_reviews.author: mk333

customer_reviews.title: No hassel battery operated thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This little unit has all the bells and whistles needed for any furnace type needed. easy to install and connect though the wiring diagram lacks a little in comparison to how the actual connections are, the normal do it your selfer can figure it out. When I tested it (in the summer) I found it very responsive to changes, and I think for about $35 dollars you cannot go wrong. It even comes with batteries. No 24 volt power supply is required to make it work or display, so it replaces the old mercury single setting switch just fine, so get ready to save some money. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Music Mike

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK WELL
customer_reviews.text: I've had White Rodgers Thermostats in my home since it was built. Liked there ease of operation and thought it was time to upgrade. I purchased this same model several years ago and it has worked well. So I changed the others to this model. Hope I get the same usage as the original ones.
customer_reviews.author: ARDAVE

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job, once it is installed
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are proficient in nano technology, don't buy it. Connecting the wires is almost impossible. There are similar units available with plenty of access for the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to hire a a.c. tech to install! Product works well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement form old model
customer_reviews.text: I got this model as a replacement to my Aunt's old system. Got the old one out and installed this new one so easy. An Absolute DIY. Comes with batteries too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice to not have to remember to turn the AC ...
customer_reviews.text: Basic programmable thermostat. Replaced the non-programmable version that came with my apartment. Nice to not have to remember to turn the AC up when I leave in the mornings and down when I get home at night. Overall does exactly what I need it do without much struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Guy

customer_reviews.title: This device is working just fine
customer_reviews.text: The device arrived and I installed it and it works fine. Much better price than some other alternatives.Recommend this vendor
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Bug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great thermostat, very easy to use. I have purchased 8 White Rodgers thermostats in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Shane  P. Yeh

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  I got 3 months out of it
customer_reviews.text: I installed this thermostat in November to replace the old mercury one I pulled out of my house, as I wanted a programmable stat to save energy. It was ok until last week; it no longer holds the programming and I wake up in a 60 degree house. I've tried replacing the batteries and redid the programming; no luck. Guess I'll be spending the $$$ to get a new (better) one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and use
customer_reviews.text: I love these White Rogers inits . The bold numbers and ease of use and programing is great. When you touch the screen the numbers are illuminated. Easy to read Hold button. Very easy set up at a geat price
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to install but great product!
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a White-Rodgers 20 year old Thermostat and ordered what looked like the same one. It was a little smaller but had the same features. It was a little difficult to install due to the small area to attach the wires. The manufacturer and seller were very helpful with questions we had, especially since the product did not come with an installation flyer. We found it online and we were also sent one from the seller. It works fine and looks good. I hope this one lasts 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: Marie ARatari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and works like a champ. Good buy, and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Price is right. Easy to install. Sleek desire. Control panel is easy to use. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Kwan

product_meta.title: Emerson 1F78-151 Single-Stage Programmable Digital Thermostat, 5-2 Day
product_meta.description: The Emerson 1F78-151 single stage thermostat has an easy to read digital display. The 1F78-151 thermostat is a 5/2 day programmable thermostat. The 1F78-151 thermostat will work on most single stage systems. For use on 24-Volt and millivolt systems. *Not compatible with electric baseboard heat and some other systems.
feature_bullets: 5-2 day programmable - set different schedules for weekdays and weekends
Compatible with single-stage heating, cooling and heat pump (without aux) systems
Precise temperature control of plus/minus 1 degree F
Battery-powered for maximum compatibility - two AAA batteries included for your convenience
